name: Lotsa Luck Lottery Simulator
description:
This simulator replicates the play of various lottery games including the Powerball lottery.  You can use it to experience playing the lottery and become familiar with its intricacies.  You can also use it to test any theories or methods that you would like to explore by simulating  in real time the play of hundreds or even thousands of individual lottery games in a matter of seconds.

Lotsa Luck retains statistics of  both cumulative and single session expenditures and winnings.  It also tracks the frequency of drawn numbers and other details of lottery play.

Options allow for modifying the games execution to suite your preference.  Allow the sim to generate your lottery ticket  numbers or select  your own lucky numbers.  Lotsa Luck!
